Name: Alias
About the game: Want to have fun? Then gather a company of friends and turn on the game. Alias, this is a word clarification game in which at least two two-person teams take part. Its essence is the explanation in other words of the hidden word. Through associations, synonyms, antonyms or hints, your accomplice must guess as many words as possible in the allotted time. A good addition is that this game can be played both online and in the same room as friends or family. Alias is so simple and interesting that it will captivate not only teenagers, but also people of all ages. More than 1000 different words are in this game, which allows a long time not repeated words that have fallen out. Thanks to the game Alias, you develop the ability to think quickly and think extraordinary.
